name: A Cure For Cancer
description: A bandit has tied the sole doctor who has discovered a cure for cancer to this track. They are also pregnant, with twins. One of those twins will grow up to be a masterful musician, one of the best the world's ever known. The other will go on to follow in their parent's footsteps and cure death - all death, that's right. The train hurtles toward them both. On the other track lies Hitler. Can you make that decision?

options.name: MegaHitler
options.description: Foolishly, MegaHitler has found himself tied down to this track. He's like Hitler, but a million times worse, and he has laser eyes that turn everyone he gazes upon racist.
